name: .SHAPR File Extension
summary: Learn about .SHAPR files and view a list of programs that open them.

description: A SHAPR file is a model created by Shapr3D, a multiplatform CAD program. It contains three-dimensional and two-dimensional model data, including the properties for each part of the design, in the proprietary SHAPR format. SHAPR files typically store models for real-life objects, such as furniture, headphones, or a water bottle.

content: Shapr3D is a 2D and 3D design app for personal, educational, and professional use. It comes with various tools for designing, visualizing, prototyping, manufacturing, and presenting designs.

As you work on your 2D or 3D design with Shapr3D, you can save it as a SHAPR file to preserve your progress. Once you save your design, you can close it, then re-open it to edit it further. To save a design as a SHAPR file, select File → Export..., then choose the SHAPR format from the format list.

NOTE: Shapr3D is available in Basic and Pro versions. The Basic version is free, and the Pro version is available only via subscription but provides much more functionality, including creating SHAPR files.

instructions: You can open a SHAPR file with Shapr3D in Windows, macOS, and iPadOS. For example, to open a SHAPR file with Shapr3D on a Mac, select File → Import.
